CustomField.description: This field categorizes OPCs into categories that match the quota system.

Services Change Request","Additional Services", "Legal - Services Change Request Internal","Additional Services", "Training", "Additional Services", "Services - Partner", "Additional Services", "Legal - CPI / Recurring Increase","SFA", "Cancellation - Customer","Churn", "Cancellation - Module","Churn", "Cancellation - Product","Churn", "Downgrade - Product","Churn", "Legal - User Count Decrease","Churn", "Downgrade - Acquired Add-on Module","Acquired Contract", "Legal - Consulting Services","Additional Services", "Upgrade", "Additional Services", "Intapp Prime", "Additional Services", "ACV Downgrade/Partial ACV Cancellation", "Churn", "New Implementation", "Additional Services", "ACV Recovery/Partial ACV Reinstatement", "Churn", "Platform Conversion - CustomField.label: Sale Category (OPC)
